content.query:
CREATE VIEW gold.dim_customer
AS
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://stretailenvdev.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/dim_customer',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS query1;

AS

    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://stretailenvdev.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/dim_employee',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS query1;
